item.title: By: Roger Lewis
item.dc:creator: Roger Lewis
item.description: The cure were great and Reeves Gavrelles the new guitar player was a very cool addition as well I particularly enjoyed their riffing on the top he and Robert really got into it playing off each other for a Jazzer like me and fan of Hendrix to boot that was the highlight for me a musical tour deforce and examination of the intervalis diabolos.
item.content:encoded: The cure were great and Reeves Gavrelles the new guitar player was a very cool addition as well I particularly enjoyed their riffing on the top he and Robert really got into it playing off each other for a Jazzer like me and fan of Hendrix to boot that was the highlight for me a musical tour deforce and examination of the intervalis diabolos.

item.title: By: Toby
item.dc:creator: Toby
item.description: It's good to hear a fellow philosopher sounding (what I think of as) juicily upbeat. This piece is kind of like a jazz-philosophy smorgas for the world weary. I found reading it repleneshing. <br /><br />I hope The Cure were as on song!
item.content:encoded:
It's good to hear a fellow philosopher sounding (what I think of as) juicily upbeat. This piece is kind of like a jazz-philosophy smorgas for the world weary. I found reading it repleneshing.

I hope The Cure were as on song!
